      • isServiceRunning

        public static boolean isServiceRunning(android.content.Context ctx,
                                       java.lang.String className)
        用来判断服务是否运行.
        参数:
        ctx - the ctx
        className - 判断的服务名字 "com.xxx.xx..XXXService"
        返回:
        true 在运行 false 不在运行

      • stopRunningService

        public static boolean stopRunningService(android.content.Context ctx,
                                         java.lang.String className)
        停止服务.
        参数:
        ctx - the ctx
        className - the class name
        返回:
        true, if successful

      • getNumCores

        public static int getNumCores()
        Gets the number of cores available in this device, across all processors. Requires: Ability to peruse the filesystem at "/sys/devices/system/cpu"
        返回:
        The number of cores, or 1 if failed to get result
